settings.text_subheading: our founder’s story to nuchu nourishment

settings.richtext_content: In 2018, I was thrown a curveball – an IBS diagnosis that reshaped my perspective on health. This pivotal moment led me to reconsider my dietary choices. Despite the widespread popularity of gummies, finding ones without added sugar or artificial sweeteners, crucial for my gut health, proved to be a challenge.

settings.text_title: making a truly good wellness gummy
settings.richtext_content: Driven by a mission to discover cleaner options, I embarked on a journey to create the ultimate gummy – vegan, gluten-free, and free from added sugars, artificial sweeteners, flavors, or colors. My vision was clear: a delicious treat that not only tasted good but also remained faithful to my commitment to wholesome living. With every chew infused with passion, I proudly named my creation 'Nuchu'.

Today, I am thrilled to unveil three unique products, each meticulously crafted to cater to specific wellness needs: ‘glow me away,’ ‘calm me down,’ and ‘boost me up’. These offerings are designed with a touch of tender loving care, ensuring that your wellness journey now has bespoke companions. At Nuchu, we're all about tailoring your path to well-being.

Join the Nuchu vibe – where gut love meets flavor, and your well-being takes center stage. It's more than just supplements; it's about the journey to a happier, healthier you. Welcome to the Nuchu experience – we're here to revolutionise wellness!

settings.text_heading: All the best and nothing less
settings.text_paragraph: We stripped away "added sugars, artificial sweeteners", and other fake nasty ingredients for totally yummy gummies you can feel good about.

settings.text_content: our best-for-you gummy blends are the perfect addition to your daily routine.
